body_html:
Will there be a way for explicitly targeting a particular device?

For instance: if in the logits_fn I explicitly set the device target (tf.device()), then will any automatically generated loss and training networks follow that target?
body_text:
Will there be a way for explicitly targeting a particular device?
For instance:  if in the logits_fn I explicitly set the device target (tf.device()), then will any automatically generated loss and training networks follow that target?
body:
Will there be a way for explicitly targeting a particular device?

For instance:  if in the `logits_fn` I explicitly set the device target (`tf.device()`), then will any automatically generated loss and training networks follow that target?
